instruction: Generate a list of ten skills a company may be looking for in a good candidate
output:
1. Excellent communication skills
2. Creative problem-solving
3. Ability to work independently and in teams
4. Good organization and time-management
5. Comfort with learning new technologies
6. Forward-thinking mindset
7. Tact and diplomacy
8. Self-motivation
9. Attention to detail
10. Aptitude for leadership
